flawed_nl_solution:
After the 100 people leave, there will be 300-100 = <<300-100=2000>>2000 people left.
The 2000 people will eat 2000/300 = 2000/300 as much food as the original group of people in the castle.
The 60 days' worth of food will last this smaller group for 60 days / (2000/300) = <<60/(2000/300)=9>>9 more days.
#### 9

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 200, not 2000. It appears an extra zero was added to the number.
